bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR ENTERPRISE MONITORING BASED ON A COMPONENT BUSINESS MODEL

nplcit.text: Arch-int et al., "Development of industrial information systems on the Web using business components", 2003
Lieslio "Portfolio Decision Analysis for Robust Project Selection and Resource Allocation", a dissertation on how organizations make project resource decisions
Pfitzmann et al. "IBM's Unified Governance Framework (UGF) Initiative", an article on how IT components can support governance
Tadinen "Human resources management aspects of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Systems Projects", a thesis on HR practices across ERP projects and lifecycles

abstract.p: A method and system for enterprise monitoring maps monitor events to elements of a component business model of the enterprise and displays the mapped events using the component business model. Rules are used to determine whether events captured from a monitor source are monitor events. An enterprise monitor metamodel linking monitor artifacts and elements of a component business model is used to annotate monitor events with data from the component business model of the enterprise.
